DOC.brief_summary: B1621007 is designed to study the safety and efficacy of PF-04937319 in patients with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study To Evaluate Safety And Efficacy Of Investigational Drug - PF04937319 In Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: patients with type 2 diabetes, on metformin, age between 1855 yrs, male or female patients with type 1 diabetes, medically unstable, unacceptable clinical laboratory test results at screening
